articles.title: Falcons' Mularkey retiring, Joe Whitt to coach secondary
articles.description: FLOWERY BRANCH, Ga. (AP) — Atlanta Falcons tight end coach Mike Mularkey, the former Tennessee Titans coach, is retiring.
articles.content:
FLOWERY BRANCH, Ga. (AP) Atlanta Falcons tight end coach Mike Mularkey, the former Tennessee Titans coach, is retiring.
Mularkey's retirement came after he returned for his second stint in Atlanta, lasting only one season, to cap 25 years of coaching. He als… [+964 chars]

articles.title: ML King Day activities to emphasize voters and nonviolence

articles.title: Mexico's Popocatepetl volcano spews ash, glowing rock
articles.description: MEXICO CITY (AP) — An explosion at the crater of Mexico's Popocatepetl volcano hurled incandescent rock about a mile (1.6 kilometers) down its slopes Thursday.
articles.content:
MEXICO CITY (AP) An explosion at the crater of Mexico's Popocatepetl volcano hurled incandescent rock about a mile (1.6 kilometers) down its slopes Thursday.
The blast early also sent a column of ash 2 miles (3 kilometers) into the sky near the nation's capi… [+488 chars]

articles.title: Mississippi House passes bill to cover gap in teacher raise
articles.description: JACKSON, Miss. (AP) — The Mississippi House voted Thursday to pay the full cost for this year's teacher pay raise.
articles.content:
JACKSON, Miss. (AP) The Mississippi House voted Thursday to pay the full cost for this year's teacher pay raise.
The $1,500-per-person raise was approved during the 2019 session. But, officials later discovered a bureaucratic error that resulted in too few t… [+501 chars]

articles.title: Rhode Island Senate president pushes for plastic bag ban
articles.description: PROVIDENCE, R.I. (AP) — Rhode Island's Senate president said Thursday that he has introduced a bill to ban single-use plastic bags at checkout counters statewide.
articles.content:
PROVIDENCE, R.I. (AP) Rhode Island's Senate president said Thursday that he has introduced a bill to ban single-use plastic bags at checkout counters statewide.

articles.title: Iraqis from top brass to street decry breach of sovereignty
articles.description: BEIRUT (AP) — In the span of weeks, Iraqis watched with deepening anxiety as their country, long the site of proxy fighting between Iran-backed militias and U.S. forces, has turned into an open battlefield.
articles.content:

articles.title: Donald Glover's 'Atlanta' set for two more seasons in 2021
articles.description: PASADENA, Calif. (AP) — Donald Glover’s “Atlanta” is returning with new episodes, but not for another year.
articles.content:
PASADENA, Calif. (AP) Donald Glovers Atlanta is returning with new episodes, but not for another year.
